title: Sutan Anwar
text: Anwar Sutan (born 21 March 1914 , date death unknown) was an Indonesian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played for the <a href="Indonesia%20national%20football%20team">Dutch East Indies</a> in the <a href="1938%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1938 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="VIOS%20Batavia">VIOS Batavia</a>. He has Minangkabau blood from his parents in West Sumatera.
